name: BlazeMeter Step-by-step Debugger
description: This plugin enables step-by-step debugging of JMeter scripts

0.4.changes: Fixed bugs on not evaluating variables

0.5.changes:
- Add last sampler result tab;

- Choose TG from context of tree;

- Fixed italic font in tree not shown on Mac;

- Fixed blue color for current element is blue-on-blue for Mac;

- Fixed logging lab for old jmeter versions;

- Fixed clear data in info tabs and listeners;

- Fixed modification thread groups;

name: Directory Listing Config
description: Directory listing config allows to set file path from source directory into jmeter-variable

0.2.changes:
Fixed resolve JMeter variables for Destination Variable name

Fix relative path

0.3.changes:
Fixed synchronize access to underlying iterator

Allow copying Directory Listing Config elements in GUI

name: Random CSV Data Set
description: Config item that allows reading CSV files in random order

0.4.changes: optimize performance, fix empty lines processing, fix browse button dialog

0.8.changes: fix nulll point exception when independent list

name: Parallel Controller & Sampler
description: Parallel Controller makes all of its children to run in parallel to each other

0.2.changes: Fixed class name clash with Debugger plugin

0.4.changes: Fixed reset Thread Context in all AbstractTestElements

0.5.changes: Fixed Concurrency Modification exception for Config elements

0.9.changes: Fixed Test Actions (Start Next Thread Loop, Stop Thread, Stop All Threads)

0.10.changes: Add ability to limit the number of thread to start to simulate browser's real threading

name: Rotating JTL Listener
description: Rotating listener provides writing sequence of files, limited by number of samples per file.

0.2.changes: Fixed file naming when file hasn't extension

name: BlazeMeter Uploader
description: This is special plugin in for uploading results to BlazeMeter/BlazeMeter Sense during test running or immediately after test end

name: Weighted Switch Controller
description: This controller takes the information about child elements and offers managing relative weights for them.

0.2.changes:
Fixed samples generation in nested controllers(Transaction, Simple, Weighted Switch);

- Fixed samples generation with disabled subgroups;

- Added effect of disabled subgroups in GUI;

- Added a ban on changing the column 'Name' and the disabled subgroup in GUI

0.4.changes:
Fixed samples generation in transaction controllers

Fixed styles for JMeter Darcula

0.5.changes:
Fixed samples generation in transaction controllers (all nested levels)

Fixed samples generation with disabled subgroups

name: XMPP Protocol Support
description: Enables testing XMPP (Jabber) protocol servers

1.5.1.changes: Added support for 'from mode' option in XMPP Connection

name: BlazeMeter - HLS Plugin
description: HLS protocol sampler, enabling testing for streaming applications

1.3.changes:
Plugin name has been changed to continue with the convention of BlazeMeter plugins.
Logo has been added.
Issue in live stream when it did not show results in View Results Tree has been fixed.

2.0.changes: Major new release with a lot of bug fixes and new features (simplified UI, granular assertions, etc). Please check the readme

3.0.changes: Major new release with support for MPEG DASH and new features (like automatic protocol recognition, sampler renaming, etc). Please check the readme

3.0.1.changes: Patch fix for playlist reload timing and behaviour for interrupted tests

3.0.2.changes: Patch fix for equals signs on URIs, subtitles better handled

3.0.3.changes: Patch fix master-slave tests & URL protocol recognition improved

3.1.changes: Improved protocol recognition and fixed minor dash issues

name: BlazeMeter - HTTP/2 Legacy Plugin
description: This is a deprecated HTTP/2 plugin which allows to test the HTTP2 protocol in java 8 (Recommended to migrate to v2.0 or higher)

name: BlazeMeter - HTTP/2 Plugin
description: HTTP/2 protocol sampler

1.1.changes: Fix memory leak and JTL output error

1.2.changes: Fix HTTP2 plugin POST support to include proper request and fix issue with callback handler

1.3.changes: Added support for standards JMeter listeners and partial support for push promise

1.4.changes: Fixed serialization issue for JMeter distributed mode

1.4.1.changes: Fix issue handling http responses without body (like 204 status code)

1.5.changes: Request methods PATCH & DELETE were added. Also support for no SSL connections and libraries updated.

1.6.changes: Added support for Gzip in response headers and added data frame to PUT method

2.0.changes: Major release using as baseline Java 11 and Jetty 11, proxy support and many other new functionalities!

name: BlazeMeter - RTE Plugin
description: Support for RTE (remote terminal emulation), providing a recorder, sampler and config element to interact with remote terminal servers

1.0.3.changes: Fix TN5250 protocol keys mapping for F13-F24, roll down and roll up keys

1.0.4.changes: Allow sending text to TN3230 server when screen has no defined fields

1.1.changes: Support for setting fields by label and update dm3270 which includes tn3270 protocol enhancements support improvements (SSCP LU DATA, BID) and additional fixes (hiding invisible fields from screen and sending some fields back to server)

1.1.1.changes: This version fixes property naming for inputs by label feature

2.0.changes: New rte recorder test element added and a many fixes!

2.1.changes: New recorder features allowing to record input by label, wait for text and assertions

2.1.1.changes: Fix bug originated in version 2.0 which could not allow user to insert empty inputs.

2.2.changes: Extractor post-processor added, hide credentials and sampler naming while recording!

2.2.1.changes: Wait conditions behaviour changed and some reported issues fixed

3.0.1.changes: Fix issue with no screen interaction after sample naming

3.1.changes: Send attention key to a determined position, and some bug fix!

3.1.1.changes: Fix various issues regarding input by tab, input by label, screen painting, and added support for ALP charset

3.2.changes: Wait for disconnect support in RTESampler and automatic detection by RTERecorder

3.2.1.changes: Circular field support, alarm for VT420 and many bug fixes!

name: BlazeMeter - Correlation Recorder Plugin
description: Correlation Recorder provides auto-correlation of variables at recording time

1.0.changes: Siebel Plugin has evolved into Correlation Recorder with lots of new features. Please check documentation to learn about all the new goodies!

1.1.changes: Improvement in ui, documentation and new functionalities for Correlation Extractor and Replacements

1.1.1.changes: Fixed issue with duplicated rules with disable them

1.1.2.changes: Fixed issue that removed equals sign from request body

name: IBM MQ Support
description: A JMeter Plugin to put and get message on IBM MQ Queue, also publish message on Topic. It connect to MQ Server through server channel using ip address, port number, userID and password (if the channel has CHLAUTH rules).

name: BlazeMeter - Citrix Plugin
description: Support for Citrix protocol (only available for Microsoft Windows)

name: jmeter - Core
description: Core functionality for JMeter, including GUI and engine.

name: jmeter - TCP Protocol Support
description: The TCP Sampler opens a TCP/IP connection to the specified server. It then sends the text, and waits for a response.

name: jmeter - LDAP Protocol Support
description: This Sampler lets you send a different Ldap request(Add, Modify, Delete and Search) to an LDAP server.

name: jmeter - OS Process Support
description: The OS Process Sampler is a sampler that can be used to execute commands on the local machine.

name: jmeter - MongoDB Support
description: Supports testing MongoDB performance

name: jmeter - Mail/SMTP Support
description: The SMTP Sampler can send mail messages using SMTP/SMTPS protocol.

name: jmeter - JUnit Support
description: Executes JUnit tests compiled into JARs

name: jmeter - JMS Support
description: Offers JMS Subscriber, Publisher and JMS P2P

name: jmeter - JDBC Support
description: This sampler lets you send an JDBC Request (an SQL query) to a database.

name: jmeter - Java Components
description: Java Sampler and other components

name: jmeter - FTP Protocol Support
description: This controller lets you send an FTP 'retrieve file' or 'upload file' request to an FTP server.

name: jmeter - HTTP Protocol Support
description: This sampler lets you send an HTTP/HTTPS request to a web server.

name: jmeter - Various Core Components
description: Ships a lot of various components for JMeter, including Debug Sampler

name: 3 Basic Graphs
description:
• Average Response Time
  • Active Threads
  • Successful/Failed Transactions

name: 5 Additional Graphs
description:
• Response Codes
  • Bytes Throughput
  • Connect Times
  • Latency
  • Hits/s

name: Composite Timeline Graph
description: Graph that is able to show several other graphs data in single place

name: Distribution/Percentile Graphs
description:
• Response Times Distribution
  • Response Times Percentiles

name: KPI vs KPI Graphs
description:
• Hits/s vs Active Threads
  • Avg Response Time vs Active Threads

name: Auto-Stop Listener
description: Ability to stop test based on runtime KPIs

name: Custom Thread Groups
description:
Adds new Thread Groups:
  • Stepping Thread Group
  • Ultimate Thread Group
  • Concurrency Thread Group
  • Arrivals Thread Group
  • Free-Form Arrivals Thread Group

2.2.changes: fixed issue with JMeter 2.11 not working with concurrency thread group

2.3.changes: fixed issue with Test Action + start next loop not working with CTG

2.4.changes: fixed variable processing in load parameter fields

2.5.changes: fixed stop test after hold limit

2.8.changes: Fix remote testing problems, fix ATG stopping

2.9.changes: Support JMeter's way of prefixing threads for distributed testing

2.10.changes: Remove deprecation flag from Stepping Thread Group

name: Console Status Logger
description: Small listener that prints each second a line with runtime stats into console

name: Variables from CSV File
description: Config item to load one-line CSV file into JMeter variables on startup. Helps to have external configuration file for test plan.

name: DBMon Sample Collector
description: DbMon lets you plot performance counters accessible via SQL when the test is running.

name: Dummy Sampler
description: Debugging sampler that just generates result as you specified. Very convenient to debug your complex scripts

0.3.changes: Add URL and SampleResult class fields to UI, add Dummy Subsample Postprocessor

name: Flexible File Writer
description: Flexible File Writer plugin allows writing test results in flexible format, specified via GUI.

name: Inter-Thread Communication
description: Global string queues for inter-thread communication

name: Custom JMeter Functions
description: A number of additional JMeter functions that cover more of typical needs.

name: HTTP Raw Request
description: Low-level HTTP request, solves memory problem for huge file upload/download case. Also ships Raw Data Source preprocessor.

name: JMS Send and Receive Sampler
description: If you are using JMS (Java Message Service) to send and receive messages between two or more clients, we have created a sampler which enables you to send and receive messages.

name: JMXMon Sample Collector
description: JMXMon lets you plot JMX performance metrics over time when the test is running.

0.3.changes: Local JVM connection option (for JMeter self-monitoring)

name: JSON/YAML Plugins (deprecated)
description: [Deprecated in favor of core JMeter 4.0+] Allows extracting values from JSON/YAML responses using JSONPath syntax. Also ships JSONPath Assertion.

2.5.changes: Fix encoding for multibyte data in JSONPath Assertion

2.6.changes: Fix case of asserting array against array

2.7.changes: Added YAML path extractor and assertion

name: Lock File Config
description: Lock file allows you to set locks to prevent multiple JMeters from running on the same machine

name: OAuth Sampler (Deprecated)
description: Does not work with JMeter v3.2+. OAuth sampler is an extended REST sampler which in addition includes the properties needed for this authorization

name: PerfMon (Servers Performance Monitoring)
description: Allows collecting target server resource metrics. You need to start ServerAgent on a target machine.

name: Parameterized Controller & Set Variables Action
description: A controller and sampler to help reuse modules with variables in the scope

name: Redis Data Set
description: Allows reading test data from Redis storage

0.3.changes: fixed exception when RANDOM_KEEP chosen on a list

0.5.changes: fixed ssl config in redis dataset so it actually gets used

name: Throughput Shaping Timer
description: A plugin to set desired hits/s (RPS) schedule

2.1.changes: Added __tstFeeback() function to integrate with Concurrency Thread Group

2.2.changes: Expose overall schedule data as JMeter properties

2.4.changes: Fix performance problem with notifyAll() used

2.5.changes: Fix negative values from TSTFeedback function

name: UDP Protocol Support
description: This plugin adds UDP protocol support to JMeter. With this plugin you can load test DNS, NTP, TFTP, Boot servers and many-many other systems.

name: Selenium/WebDriver Support
description: This plugin allows testing real browser behavior using Selenium/WebDriver technology

2.3.changes: Add vars, props and ctx to Sampler

name: XML Plugins
description: Currently ships XMLFormatPostProcessor

name: jpgc - Standard Set
description: Virtual package, select to install its dependencies

name: Command-Line Graph Plotting Tool
description: There is small command-line utility for generating graphs out of JTL files. It behave just like right-click context menu on all graphs. The tool can generate PNG, CSV or both. Note you can use GraphsGeneratorListener if you want to bulk generate graphs after a test or for existing results.

2.2.changes: Fixed logging for JMeter since v3.2

name: Filter Results Tool
description: Often it's necessary to filter the results of a test to obtain a global vision with pages without all the urls that are declared in the html page.

2.2.changes: Fixed logging for JMeter since v3.2

name: Graphs Generator Listener
description: Graphs Generator Listener generates several graphs at end of test

name: Merge Results
description: Merge Results is a tool to merge files of results (to simplify the comparison of two or more load tests).

name: Page Data Extractor
description: This graph will plot data extracted from page results (status, health pages, etc.).

name: Test Plan Check Tool
description: Small command line tool to check test plan consistency. Helps in automation of JMeter executions.

2.2.changes: Fixed working plugin with JMeter v3.2

2.3.changes: Fixed logging for JMeter since v3.2

name: Synthesis Report
description: Synthesis Report is a mix between Summary Report and Aggregate Report

2.2.changes: Fixed Configuration Percentiles in Aggregate Report. Fixed Labels in csv reports

name: HTTP Simple Table Server
description: The main idea is to use a tiny http server in JMeter Plugins to manage the dataset files with simple commands to get / add rows of data in files.

name: Plugins Manager
description: Adds menu item into Options menu to access UI for installing/removing additional plugins

1.0.2.changes:
- Added cache plugins repo

- Optimize pmgr requests

- Fixed crash if pmgr put in lib folder

- Fixed decode PATH for JMeterHome

1.1.changes:
- Drop cache if we know it is outdated

- Fix bug with cmdrunner lib install

1.2.changes:
- Fixed parse test plan(xml version 1.1)

- Fix bug with install/update libs

1.6.changes: Changes to support JMeter 5.4 deprecation of old loggers

1.7.changes: Fix couple of security issues, including Log4Shell

1.2.0.changes: Configurable pseudo TTY allocation; bug fixes

name: MQTT Protocol Samplers
description: connect, publish, subscribe and disconnect samplers

1.3.3.changes: Sampler now supports Header/Cookie/Auth Manager, reports response headers, and handles binary attachments.

name: HTTP Form Manager
description:
This plugin makes JMeter behave a little more like a browser: form fields are automatically populated with preselected values.
  • No more manual correlation of hidden inputs, such as session variables.
  • Just correlate parameters that actually relate to user input.

name: ISO-8583 Sampler
description:
Generate ISO-8583 financial transactions for testing of payment gateways and switches
With support for cryptogram calculation (PIN Block, MAC, ARQC)
Based on the jPOS framework

1.1.changes:
• Upgrade to jPOS v2.1.4
  • Fire-and-forget messages
  • Non-persistent Channel option
  • Advanced Mux options to configure response/request matching
  • Non-message related cryptographic functions
  • Packager logging
  • Multiple success response codes
  • ARQC transaction data overriding, custom padding, and automatic CVR extraction
  • Bug fixes: #2
  • Incompatible changes:
    • ISO8583 Crypto PreProcessor: Transaction Data field now overrides the ARQC input instead of appending
    • ISO8583 Config: renamed to ISO8583 Connection Configuration

1.2.changes:
• Upgrade to jPOS v2.1.6
  • Round-robin selection for multiple connections in server mode
  • Optional reference ID for explicitly linking Sampler to Connection Config
  • Request Listener script option to handle incoming messages (0800 network management)
  • Bug fixes: #30, #32

name: SSHMon Sample Collector
description: Monitoring plugin for agentless collection and plotting of remote server metrics via SSH connections

1.2.changes: Bug fixes and new locale config option.

1.3.changes:
• Replaced ssh client library JSch with Apache Mina SSHD
  • ProxyJump support
  • Bug fixes

name: WS Security for SOAP
description: Digital signature, encryption, decryption, timestamp and username token for SOAP messages via Pre/Post-Processors that modify sampler payloads/responses.

1.4.changes: Added support for decryption of response messages

1.5.changes: Added WSS Timestamp Pre-Processor. Added WSS UsernameToken timestamp precision option and 'no password' option.

1.6.changes:
• Support for signing/encrypting/decrypting attachments
  • Upgrade to wss4j v2.2
  • Support for TCP Sampler, SMTP Sampler
  • New options:
    • Header: Actor, mustUnderstand
    • Parts to Sign/Encrypt: ID
  • Removed options:
    • Signature algorithm http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmldsig-more#rsa-ripemd160
    • Digest algorithm http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#ripemd160
    • Key encryption algorithm http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#rsa-oaep-mgf1p

1.7.changes:
• SOAP Message Signer: Support for symmetric signature (HMAC)
  • SOAP Message Decrypter: Support for multiple decryption keys
  • Default keystore type is now JCEKS (compatible with JKS and PKCS12)
  • Bug fixes
  • Incompatible changes:
    • SOAP Message Decrypter: Private Key Password field removed (use Credentials table instead)

1.8.changes:
• Upgrade to wss4j v2.3.1
  • Configurable keystore type (JCEKS/JKS/PKCS12)
  • Bug fixes

name: Hadoop/HBase Testing
description:
• HBase Connection Config
  • HDFS Operations
  • Hadoop Job Tracker Sampler
  • HBase CRUD Sampler
  • HBase Scan Sampler
  • HBase Rowkey Sampler

name: WebSocket Samplers by Peter Doornbosch
description: Provides 6 samplers for load testing WebSocket applications. Use the WebSocket request-response sampler for testing a basic request-response flow (the most common case), or combine the other samplers to support a more sophisticated WebSocket test scenario.

0.9.changes: Single read sampler can be made optional, which avoids the sampler to fail when no websocket frame is received; this is useful in test scenario's where you can not exactly predict the server's behavior.

0.10.changes: New feature: frame filters. To handle situations in which the server sends unsolicited messages and the occurrence of such messages is hard to predict or otherwise hard to take into account in the test plan, filters can be used to discard such messages before they are seen by a sampler.

0.11.1.changes: New feature: you can control what's happening with the websocket connections at the end of the test: leave open (default), close on websocket level or close on tcp level, by setting JMeter property websocket.thread.stop.policy. Fix: all result viewers will now correctly show the size of received bytes. Frame payload is counted as 'body', frame headers as 'headers'. By default, filtered frames do not contribute to 'received size', but this can be changed by setting JMeter property websocket.result.size_includes_filtered_frames.

1.0.changes: New feature: registers size of sent messages too. Requires JMeter version 3.1 or later!

1.1.changes: Ready for / compatible with JMeter 4. New feature: send unsolicited pong.

1.2.changes: Improved ping/pong filtering and added option to read (binary) payload data from file

1.2.2.changes: Improved memory usage for receiving binary messages

1.2.7.changes: Fixed bug about not always correctly reading frame under heavy load in combination with short read timeouts, and some other minor bug fixes.

1.2.8.changes: Added option to Single Read Sampler to read Text OR Binary, whatever is received.

name: ElasticSearch backend listener
description:
Apache JMeter plugin for sending sample results to an ElasticSearch engine.
  • Simply add a "Backend Listener" and change the implementation
  • Change the listener's configuration
  • To use filters, simply seperate their name by a semicolon. (f1;f2;f3)

2.4.2.changes: Added string conversion to number for ElasticSearch

2.4.3.changes: Fixed class loader problem with JavaFX StringConverter class

2.5.0.changes: Switched to low-level client v6.4 & added custom variables support

2.5.1.changes: Added way of adding all response headers as well as request headers as ElasticSearch Index properties. (Basically JSON key/value pairs)

2.5.3.changes: Fixed error with filters (#2), refactored the method.

2.5.4.changes: Fixed error with filters (#37), refactored the method.

2.6.0.changes: Added AWS support, added RegExp support in filters, fixed bug with header parsing

2.6.1.changes: Fixed bug with header parsing (#40, thanks @ncasaux)

2.6.5.changes: New SSL feature, header parsing fixes, multiple little bug fixes.

2.6.6.changes: Fixed issue with index types ES 7.0+

2.6.7.changes: Fixed breaking issue with getElasticSearchVersion() method

2.6.8.changes: Fixed breaking issue with SSL conflicts

2.6.9.changes: Fixed breaking issue with SSL conflicts

2.6.10.changes: Fixed issue with sending variables through headers (#61)

2.6.11.changes: Fixed issue with deprecated methods resulting in errors and timeout issues

2.7.0.changes: Added an exclude feature for filters

name: JMeter Listener pack
description:
This JMeter Plugin allows to write load test data on-the-fly to ClickHouse (as well as InfluxDB, ElasticSearch, with additional feature: aggregation of Samplers)
Explanations and usage examples on project wiki.
Dashboards for ClickHouse.

1.7.changes: New ClickHouse table scheme jmresults(buffer)->jmresults_data(ops storage with extended data request/response)->jmresults_statistic(mat view as archive storage). New field (hostname) in stats

name: Kafka backend listener
description:
Apache JMeter plugin for sending sample results to a Kafka server.
  • Simply add a "Backend Listener" and change the implementation
  • Change the listener's configuration
  • To use filters, simply separate their name by a semicolon. (f1;f2;f3)

name: UbikLoadPack Auto-correlator plugin
description: Plugin which provides the ability to easily load tests Vaadin, Oracle Siebel, Oracle PeopleSoft, Oracle Hyperion and Oracle JD-Edwards EntrepriseOne (JDE Eone) applications with Apache JMeter

name: UbikLoadPack Video Streaming plugin
description: Plugin which provides the ability to easily load test servers delivering Adaptive Bitrate Streaming (ABR). It supports the following implementations: Low Latency Mpeg-Dash, Mpeg-Dash, Apple HLS / Low-Latency HLS (LL-HLS), Microsoft Smooth (HSS) and Adobe HDS. Both Live and VOD streams are automatically handled. The plugin realistically simulates players and outputs video specific metrics allowing you to analyze User Experience

8.0.4.changes: Live DASH: Introduce option to follow redirect URL for Manifest Reload

8.0.2.changes: Bugfix version in Installer and HLS non master playlist detection

8.0.0.changes: Introduce support for Apple Low-Latency HLS (LL-HLS), see https://www.ubik-ingenierie.com/blog/performance-testing-low-latency-hls-servers/

7.2.8.changes: DASH and SMOTH: use play ahead for LIVE. DASH: add support for Trick mode in VOD Playback. Live Edge : Introduce option to allow following Live Edge on every reload or only at the playing start.

7.2.1.changes: Minor bugfix on test stop and detection of VOD

7.2.0.changes: Added support for Low Latency DASH

7.1.9.changes: Added ability to filter video streams by supported codec. Bugfixes

7.1.8.changes: Performance improvements. Bugfix for distributed testing

7.1.7.changes: VOD: Add the option to resume a video between iterations. VOD: Add option to start video at an offset. Some bugfixes

7.1.6.changes: Custom metrics graphs now use Percentile 95 for response times instead of mean. Improvements in error reporting + bugfixes

7.0.0.changes: Redesigned reporting to have live reporting and reporting per request type. New video metric. DASH : Added support to the Descriptor of the AdaptationSet, Added support for attribute suggestedPresentationDelay

6.6.0.changes: Let user choose the audio and subtitles track by the language/name of the track, handle EXT-X-MEDIA, handle subtitles, improve HTTPS performances, bugfixes

name: UbikLoadPack GWT plugin
description: Plugin which provides the ability to easily script and performance test GWT based applications. It allows to Record and transform GWTRPC requests to XML, Out of the box transformation of requests from XML back to GWTRPC, On-demand transformation of responses from GWTRPC to XML for optional extraction, On-demand transformation of requests from Java objects back to GWTRPC, On-demand transformation of responses from GWTRPC to Java for optional extraction, Assertion on GWT response to check they are OK, View Results Tree renderer to test XPath extractions of data from GWTRPC responses

name: Azure backend listener
description: Apache JMeter plugin that enables you to send test results to Azure Application Insights.

0.2.8.changes: Add new logSampleData option for logging response data.

0.2.7.changes: Add new logResponseData option for logging response data.

0.2.6.changes: Add support for connection string and deprecate Instrumentation Key.

0.2.5.changes: Ability to send arbitrary response headers as metrics.

0.2.3.changes: Ability to add custom properties. Set Operation name to the test name value.

0.2.2.changes: Ability to filter samplers (list and regex)

name: GCP pubsub plugin
description:
Jmeter plugin to Publish and Subscribe Messages to GCP PubSub.
  • Simply add a "Publisher/Suscriber config " and provide the service credentials
  • Add the Publisher/Subscriber sampler to send/read events
  • Author Details

name: Prometheus Listener Plugin
description: A Jmeter plugin to expose sampled metrics to an endpoint to be scraped by Prometheus.

name: Apdex Score Calculator
description: Calculates the Apdex score and rating of Samplers for a given satisfied threshold.

2.0.1.changes: Addition of Pass/Fail threshold when running the plugin from CLI in CI/CD.

name: Right Tail Outlier Detector
description: A Jmeter plugin that detects and removes outliers in the right tail using Tukey fences.

1.0.4.changes: Addition of Pass/Fail threshold when running the plugin from CLI in CI/CD.

1.0.1.changes: Fix of HelpLink and of jar version number

name: Results Comparator
description: Compares the results of two test runs using Cohen's d effect size.

3.1.2.changes: Addition of Pass/Fail threshold when running the plugin from CLI in CI/CD.

name: AWS Support
description: JMeter plugin to execute test over AWS Services like Kinesis Data Stream, SQS Standard and FIFO queue and SNS Standard and FIFO topic.

1.0.0.changes: Publish data records in Kinesis Data Stream and Produce messages in SQS Standard or FIFO queue.

2.0.0.changes: Publish messages in SNS Standard or FIFO topic.

name: Markdown Table Data-driven Controller|JsonPath Assertion for sort
description:
• 'Markdown Table Data-driven Controller' on GUI,like 'While Controller' but easier.
  • 'JsonPath Assertion' can assert elements sort 'Is Asc' or 'Is Desc' or 'All Match' or 'Any Match' or 'count between a and b'
  • 'Console And Html Report' can gen beautiful html report and console report,It's useful for Jenkins saving log

1.1.changes: Consider ThreadGroup's setting: 'Action to be taken after a Sampler error'.

name: Datadog Backend Listener
description: Send JMeter test results to Datadog

name: JMeter gRPC Request
description: Send gRPC request

1.1.0.changes: Change GUI, change process execution test, supports authentication via metadata, auto list full methods, count the failed request in the report.

1.1.1.changes: Fix: Could not find TLS ALPN provider; no working netty-tcnative, Conscrypt, or Jetty NPN/ALPN available.

1.2.0.changes: Auto generate request data base on proto file, supporting JSON string.

1.2.1.changes: JDK provider support NPN_AND_ALPN protocol when running with SSL.

description: Jmeter plugin to push events/messages to Kafka topics
name: DI KafkaMeter
ApacheJmeter Schema Assertion
description: Validate response field types based on JSON/YAML Schema

name: Dynatrace Backend Listener
description: Send JMeter test results to Dynatrace

name: Validate Thread Group
description: Adds Validation Thread Group option to the toolbar

name: baolu-csv-data-file-config
description:
• This plug-in supports automatic or manual csv data allocation for each thread.It has a similar LoadRunner capability parameterization.
  • If your request involves database update operation, using this plug-in in the test script can avoid lock waiting and improve the reliability of test results.
